pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![PyPI Package](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/branca.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/branca)[![Build Status](https://github.com/python-visualization/branca/actions/workflows/test_code.yml/badge.svg?branch=main)](https://github.com/python-visualization/branca/actions/workflows/test_code.yml)[![Gitter](https://badges.gitter.im/python-visualization/folium.svg)](https://gitter.im/python-visualization/folium)# BrancaThis library is a spinoff from [folium](https://github.com/python-visualization/folium). It can be used to generate HTML + JS. It is based on Jinja2.- Documentation: https://python-visualization.github.io/branca/- Examples: https://nbviewer.org/github/python-visualization/branca/tree/main/examples/
